trans-unit.target: TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_1<tab>(-???-)...Hey. Hey, you!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_2<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Y'all right, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_3<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)You were moanin' somethin' fierce for a while there.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_4<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Feelin' the effects of the aether, I reckon.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_5<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)You'll get used to it, though, don't worry.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRASSLEADER_000_6<tab>You there─halt!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_COACHMAN_000_7<tab>What's all this about!?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRASSLEADER_000_8<tab>Inspection! Men, search the carriage!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_9<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)I'm just an honest peddler, friend. So, er...don't be too disappointed if you don't find nothin', eh?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRASSGUARD_000_10<tab>Mind your tongue, old man, lest I cut it out!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRASSGUARD_000_11<tab>Sir, look! Somnus!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRASSLEADER_000_12<tab>Honest peddler, was it? Since when do honest peddlers deal in prohibited herbs?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRASSLEADER_000_13<tab>You're in a lot of trouble, old man. You'll rot in a dungeon till the end of your days...unless you can afford the fine.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_14<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Heh, business as usual...
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_15<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Uwaaah!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRASSMESSENGER_000_16<tab>Amalj'aa! Amalj'aa! To arms! To arms!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRASSLEADER_000_17<tab>Seven hells... Consider this a warning! Now <var 1A 02 /var>go<var 1A 01 /var>─all of you!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_18<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Phew... That kind of excitement ain't good for the heart.

TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_19<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)You be careful 'round them Brass Blades, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Bastards'll have the shirt off your back if they fancy it. Like common bandits, they are, only less honest.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_20<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Thank the gods for sendin' some beastmen to the rescue, eh!?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_21<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Hey, seein' as we've still got a long ride ahead, you mind keepin' me company till we arrive?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_22<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Them young'uns don't much care for conversation, see.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_23<tab>Brendt's the name, an' peddlin's me trade.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_24<tab>An' judgin' by your unusual garments, I'll wager you're one of them new adventurers.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_25<tab>I knew it! Goin' wherever the wind blows, seekin' fortune an' glory─now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> what I call livin'!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_26<tab>So long as you can avoid dyin', I mean. Ain't no secret that adventurin's a risky business─these days especially.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_27<tab>What was it that first attracted you to it?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_Q1_000_1<tab>Why did you become an adventurer?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_A1_000_1<tab>To gain power.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_A1_000_2<tab>To win glory.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_A1_000_3<tab>To amass a fortune.

TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_28<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>Power<var 1A 01 /var>? As in, er...power to do good? Like protectin' the weak, an' fightin' for what's right, an' all that? Aye, I thought that's what you meant. Well, adventurers do get up to a lot of fightin', that's for sure. You'll never be short of a chance to polish your warcraft in the adventurin' business.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_29<tab>When you arrive in town, you'd best enroll at the Adventurers' Guild─they'll set you on the right path.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_30<tab>An' it wouldn't hurt to join a guild, neither.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_31<tab>Ul'dah's home to a few, so if you fancy learnin' how to fight with a sword, your fists, or even spells, you should think about seekin' one out.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_32<tab>Glory, eh? Well, if you're willin' to take on them tasks as other folk ain't, an adventurer such as yourself can win fame what coin can't buy.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_33<tab>When you arrive in town, you'll want to report to the Adventurers' Guild.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_34<tab>You can find out everythin' you need to know about the adventurin' business in there.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_35<tab>Fortune, eh? Heh heh! Then I reckon you'll fit right in where we're goin'!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_36<tab>Once you've learned to handle yourself in a fight, you'll want to pay a visit to whichever craftin' or gatherin' guild tickles your fancy.

TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_37<tab>An' there're plenty to choose from, too. Whether it be weavin', alchemy, goldsmithin', or minin' that interests you, Ul'dah's got a place where you can learn your trade.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_38<tab>Adventurin' ain't just about killin' things, after all. A peaceful pastime may well help you make your fortune!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_39<tab>Well, if you ain't inclined to tell, I ain't about to pry. Might be as ol' Brendt's a chatterbox, but he sure as hells ain't no busybody.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_40<tab>We all have a secret or three, don't we? Me? <var 1A 02 /var>Dozens<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_41<tab>An' I'd rather they stayed secret, too─which is why I don't go stickin' me nose where it ain't welcome.

TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_42<tab>Just remember, though: there're more important things than fortune an' glory. Such as <var 1A 02 /var>breathin'<var 1A 01 /var>. Ain't no profit in bein' dead, an' that's a fact.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_43<tab>By the by, is this your first trip to Ul'dah?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_Q2_000_1<tab>Is this your first trip to Ul'dah?
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_A2_000_1<tab>Yes.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_A2_000_2<tab>No.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_44<tab>It is!? Well then, let this journeyed itinerant tell you the ins an' outs of your destination.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_45<tab>But of course it ain't! Still, might be as this journeyed itinerant has a few new things to teach you about your destination. Ahem!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_46<tab>Ul'dah's ruled by the sultana in name, but as most folk know, the Syndicate holds all the real power.

TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_47<tab>Them and their Monetarist cronies would happily get rid of Her Grace altogether, but that won't happen while she still commands the loyalty of the Royalists─an' the Royalists are nothin' if not loyal.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_48<tab>These factions have long fought over power, throwin' the weight of their wealth against each other, an' they show no sign of stoppin'.

TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_49<tab>'Course the lizardmen─that's the <var 1A 02 /var>Amalj'aa<var 1A 01 /var>─couldn't care less about Ul'dahn politics. They have their own interests, see─an' they ain't afraid to use force to serve 'em.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_50<tab>They say war is a gift to peddlers─need breedin' profit─an' though it shames me to say it, I'm inclined to agree...
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_51<tab>Ah, at long last.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_52<tab>Behold Ul'dah, jewel of Thanalan, where folk turn sand into gold!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_300010_NARRATION<tab>Deep in the sunbaked south, surrounded by the shifting sands of an endless desert, she rises.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_300020_NARRATION<tab>A solitary rose amidst the dust and rock. A symbol of defiance. Her name: Ul'dah.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_300030_NARRATION<tab>Even with the coming of the Seventh Umbral Era, hope springs eternal for the mongers and merchants who vie for lost fortunes in this bustling oasis.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_300040_NARRATION<tab>As the Twin Faces of Nald'thal maintain Their vigil over all that has been and shall be, the present proffers a brave soul...
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_300050_NARRATION<tab>...One whose arrival could mark the beginning of a new era of prosperity for the realm.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_60<tab>An' here's where we part ways, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_61<tab>I'm off to the markets to deliver me wares, then it's on to the highroad for me.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_62<tab>Here, I want you to have this─by way of thanks for puttin' up with me prattle.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_63<tab>You never did tell me your name, though. Hey, but here's an idea...
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_BRENDT_000_64<tab>Become the sort of storied personage I can brag about havin' met, an' I'll consider us square.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_300060_NARRATION<tab>May the Traders nurture our fortunes as They kindle the flames which burn within us all.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_300070_NARRATION<tab>For by fire are we reborn.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_WYMOND_000_70<tab>(-???-)Oi, 'venturer! Over here!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_WYMOND_000_71<tab>(-???-)Aye, I mean you.
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_WYMOND_000_72<tab>(-???-)Fresh off the carriage, by any chance? Eh? How can I tell? Heh!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_WYMOND_000_73<tab>Name's Wymond, an' my business is knowin' every bugger else's!
TEXT_MANWIL000_00548_WYMOND_000_74<tab>Now then, what if I was to offer you some invaluable advice by way of welcome to our fair city? Free of charge, even─just this once, like.
